text:
Inland flooding is the #1 cause of tropical storm fatalities. Follow these tips when in an area at risk or already flooded by #FlorenceNC:
- Listen to local officials for evacuation notices.
- DO NOT drive through standing water. A few inches of water can sweep a car away.pic.twitter.com/mhcXgDid1S

html: As a co-chair of the International Conservation Caucus, I'm proud to support this effort to share U.S. conservation expertise with our partners in South Africa. The DELTA Act will facilitate information sharing to help local authorities better protect the Okavango River Delta.
